title: Linux basics YOU need to know: Root Recall #shorts #linux #kalilinux
description: If you want to learn a lot more, watch the Linux Basics for Hackers video series with OTW. First video:   #linux #kalilinux #windows
transcript: Do you know this time-saving Linux command if I typed a command such as apt update notice I require sudo permissions for that command to work. So what I can do is simply type sudo exclamation mark exclamation mark and then run the command again now this is a very simple command so not very difficult but if you've got a big command that can save you a lot of time. So again if I clear the screen and type apt update I can type pseudo exclamation exclamation and that will allow me to repeat the command. Kali actually shows you the command that you previously typed so if I type sudo notice it's giving me apt update. So if I type apt update as a command and then just type sudo it gives me the previous command I can simply press the right arrow key and then the command is run.
